column3: I glanced {{c1::at}} my watch to see what time it was.
Don't listen {{c1::to}} what he says. He doesn't know what he's talking about.
What's so funny? What are you laughing {{c1::at}}?
Is it all right if I have a look {{c1::at}} your magazine?
I'm lonely. I need somebody to talk {{c1::to}}.
The woman sitting opposite me kept staring {{c1::at}} me.
We live in the same building, but we've never spoken {{c1::to}} one another.
Be careful with the scissors. Don't point them {{c1::at}} me.
